songs.title: Drunk (Jayglo Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Drunk, again
I'll be drunk, again
I'll be drunk, again
To feel a little love

[Breakdown]
(I wanna be drunk when I wake up)
(I wanna be drunk when I wake up)
(I wanna be drunk when I wake up)

[Chorus]
Drunk, again
I'll be drunk, again
I'll be drunk, again
To feel a little love

[Breakdown]
(I wanna be drunk when I wake up)
(I wanna be drunk when I wake up)
(I wanna be drunk when I wake up)
